item.title: Quest Tab Question
item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?
item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:6, topic:303594”][quote author=haxifix link=topic=399910.msg2965985#msg2965985 date=1253575640]
No, like when i use the sendQuest thing it looks like this let’s say,…

sendQuest("Abyssal Whip", 7339);

So, where and what do i put for the actionButton so that when that is clicked, it executes the command ::whip?

Please be specific, I am a noob and I just need to know how to do one, and then I will learn with the rest.
[/quote]

just make it s when you click it it adds the item[/quote]

What…?

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Tab Question
item.dc:creator: @haxifix haxifix
item.description:
@haxifix wrote:

Hello, is there anyway to make a command list on the quest tab, like most 508’s have but on older source like Allstar-Scape, Project Destiny, or DeltaScape?

I am sure that I have played 317’s that have this, for example: CheatScape, have a command list on the quest tab, and if you like click Barrows, it would execute the command ::barrows.

Like, here is the code for clicking the Home button on the emotes tab,

case 168: if (teleblock == true) { // Made by Mod Allstar sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("home"); // made by Mod Allstar } break;

Couldn’t you just make one of those for the quest tab, and then make it execute the custom command of your choice?

If someone can answer this question please post, if not don’t flame please.

Read full topic
